content: वृथा {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} [वृ-थाल् किच्च] {@--1@} To no purpose, in vain, uselessly, unprofitably; often with the force an adjective; व्यर्थं यत्र कपींद्रसख्यमपि मे वीर्यं हरीणां वृथा <ls>U. 3. 45</ls>; दिवं यदि प्रार्थयसे वृथा श्रमः <ls>Ku. 5. 45.</ls> {@--2@} Unnecessarily. {@--3@} Foolishly, idly, wantonly. {@--4@} Wrongly; improperly. (At the beginning of <ab>comp.</ab> वृथा may be translated by ‘vain, useless, improper, false, idle’ &c.).
